sense.def:
Z izrazom
surely
poudarimo, da menimo, da je nekaj res, in pogosto pokažemo presenečenje, ker se drugi s tem ne strinjajo.
sense.quote: She was surely one of the rarest women of our time.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
slowly but surely
, se dogaja postopoma in tistega ne moremo ustaviti.

seg.quote: Slowly but surely we're becoming a computer-centred society.
